allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update default admin password to meet validation requirements

Changed default admin password from "changeme" to "Admin123"
to satisfy password validation \(requires uppercase letter\).

Updated:
- backend/app/core/config.py: admin_password = "Admin123"
- .env.production.example: ADMIN_PASSWORD=Admin123
- CLAUDE.md: Updated seed data credentials
- LINUX_SETUP.md: Added default credentials documentation

This fixes startup error on Linux:
"Password must contain at least one uppercase letter"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
